Package br.com.caelum.vraptor.ioc.pico

Interface Summary
ComponentFactoryRegistry  
Loader Loads all resources, components and interceptors for vraptor.
 

Class Summary
DefaultComponentFactoryRegistry Registry to all ComponentRegistry classes
PicoBasedContainer A pico container based implementation of a component providing container.
PicoComponentAdapter Pico's ComponentAdapter wrapping VRaptor's ComponentFactory
PicoComponentRegistry Provides containers, controlling all scopes and registering all different components on their respective areas.
PicoProvider Managing internal components by using pico container.
There is an extension point through the registerComponents method, which allows one to give a customized container.
